info.title: Labs64 NetLicensing RESTful API
info.description:
This is a Labs64 NetLicensing RESTful API. Please use demo account - demo:demo

You can find out more about Labs64 NetLicensing at http://www.labs64.com/netlicensing

get.description: Return a list of all configured products for the current vendor

parameters.name: productnumber
parameters.description: Product number to create

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: If set to false, the product is disabled. No new licensees can be registered for the product, existing licensees can not obtain new licenses.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Product name. Together with the version identifies the product for the end customer.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Product version. Convenience parameter, additional to the product name.

parameters.name: productNumber
parameters.description: Number of product

post.description: Sets the provided properties to a product. Return an updated product

parameters.name: productNumber
parameters.description: Number of product to update

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Unique number that identifies the product. Vendor can assign this number when creating a product or let NetLicensing generate one. Read-only after creation of the first licensee for the product.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: If set to false, the product is disabled. No new licensees can be registered for the product, existing licensees can not obtain new licenses.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Product name. Together with the version identifies the product for the end customer.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Product version. Convenience parameter, additional to the product name.

get.description: Return a list of all product modules for the current vendor

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Unique number (across all products of a vendor) that identifies the product module. Vendor can assign this number when creating a product module or let NetLicensing generate one. Read-only after creation of the first licensee for the product.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: If set to false, the product module is disabled. Licensees can not obtain any new licenses for this product module.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Product module name that is visible to the end customers in NetLicensing Shop.

parameters.name: licensingModel
parameters.description: Licensing model applied to this product module. Defines what license templates can be configured for the product module and how licenses for this product module are processed during validation.

get.description: Return a product module by productModuleNumber

parameters.name: productModuleNumber
parameters.description: Number of product module

post.description: Sets the provided properties to a product module. Return an updated product module

parameters.name: productModuleNumber
parameters.description: Number of product module to update

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Unique number (across all products of a vendor) that identifies the product module.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: If set to false, the product module is disabled. Licensees can not obtain any new licenses for this product module.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Product module name that is visible to the end customers in NetLicensing Shop.

parameters.name: licensingModel
parameters.description: Licensing model applied to this product module. Defines what license templates can be configured for the product module and how licenses for this product module are processed during validation.

delete.description: Delete a product module by number

get.description: Return a list of all license templates for the current vendor

parameters.name: productModuleNumber
parameters.description: productModuleNumber to —Åreate license template object

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Unique number (across all products of a vendor) that identifies the license template. Vendor can assign this number when creating a license template or let NetLicensing generate one. Read-only after creation of the first license from this license template.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: If set to false, the license template is disabled. Licensee can not obtain any new licenses off this license template.

parameters.name: licenseType
parameters.description: type of licenses created from this license template. Supported types: FEATURE, TIMEVOLUME

get.description: Return a license template by licenseTemplateNumber

parameters.name: licenseTemplateNumber
parameters.description: Number of license template

post.description: Sets the provided properties to a license template. Return an updated license template

parameters.name: licenseTemplateNumber
parameters.description: Number of license template to update

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Unique number (across all products of a vendor) that identifies the license template. Vendor can assign this number when creating a license template or let NetLicensing generate one. Read-only after creation of the first license from this license template.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name for the licensed item

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: If set to false, the license template is disabled. Licensee can not obtain any new licenses off this license template.

parameters.name: licenseType
parameters.description: type of licenses created from this license template. Supported types: FEATURE, TIMEVOLUME

delete.description: Delete a license template by number.

get.description: Return a list of all licensees for the current vendor

parameters.name: productNumber
parameters.description: productNumber to create licensee object

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Unique number (across all products of a vendor) that identifies the licensee. Vendor can assign this number when creating a licensee or let NetLicensing generate one. Read-only after creation of the first license for the licensee.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: If set to false, the licensee is disabled. Licensee can not obtain new licenses, and validation is disabled

parameters.name: licenseeNumber
parameters.description: Number of licensee

post.description: Sets the provided properties to a licensee. Return an updated licensee

parameters.name: licenseeNumber
parameters.description: Number of licensee to update

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Unique number (across all products of a vendor) that identifies the licensee. Vendor can assign this number when creating a licensee or let NetLicensing generate one. Read-only after creation of the first license for the licensee

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: If set to false, the licensee is disabled. Licensee can not obtain new licenses, and validation is disabled

get.description: Return a list of all licenses for the current vendor

parameters.name: licenseeNumber
parameters.description: Licensee number to create license object

parameters.name: licenseTemplateNumber
parameters.description: License template number to create license object

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: If set to false, the license is disabled. License can be re-enabled, but as long as it is disabled, the license is excluded from the validation process

parameters.name: licenseModuleNumber
parameters.description: Number of license

parameters.name: licenseNumber
parameters.description: Number of license to update

parameters.name: licenseNumber
parameters.description: Number of license

get.description: Return a list of all transactions for the current vendor

parameters.name: transactionNumber
parameters.description: Number of transaction

post.description: Sets the provided properties to a transaction. Return an updated transaction

parameters.name: transactionNumber
parameters.description: Number of transaction to update

get.description: Return a list of all tokens for the current vendor

post.description: Create token by tokenType and additional token parameters

parameters.name: tokenType
parameters.description: DEFAULT - default one-time token (will be expired after first request).SHOP - shop token is used to redirect customer to the netlicensingShop(licenseeNumber is mandatory).APIKEY - APIKey-token

parameters.name: tokenNumber
parameters.description: Number of token

parameters.name: tokenNumber
parameters.description: Number of token

get.description: Return a list of all payment methods for the current vendor
Return a payment method info by paymentMethodNumber

parameters.name: paymentMethodNumber
parameters.description: Number of peyment method

post.description: Sets the provided properties to a payment method. Return an updated payment method

parameters.name: paymentMethodNumber
parameters.description: Number of payment method to update

get.description: Return a list of all licensing models supported by the service
Return a list of all license types supported by the service

basicAuth.description: HTTP Basic Authentication. Works over `HTTP` and `HTTPS`

number.description: Unique number that identifies the product. Vendor can assign this number when creating a product or let NetLicensing generate one. Read-only after creation of the first licensee for the product.

active.description: If set to false, the product is disabled. No new licensees can be registered for the product, existing licensees can not obtain new licenses

name.description: Product name. Together with the version identifies the product for the end customer

version.description: Product version. Convenience parameter, additional to the product name.

licenseAutoCreate.description: If set to 'true', non-existing licensees will be created at first validation attempt.

number.description: Unique number (across all products of a vendor) that identifies the product module. Vendor can assign this number when creating a product module or let NetLicensing generate one. Read-only after creation of the first licensee for the product.

active.description: If set to false, the product module is disabled. Licensees can not obtain any new licenses for this product module.

name.description: Product module name that is visible to the end customers in NetLicensing Shop.

licensingInfo.description: Licensing model applied to this product module. Defines what license templates can be configured for the product module and how licenses for this product module are processed during validation.

number.description: Unique number (across all products of a vendor) that identifies the license template. Vendor can assign this number when creating a license template or let NetLicensing generate one. Read-only after creation of the first license from this license template.

active.description: If set to false, the license template is disabled. Licensee can not obtain any new licenses off this license template.

licenseType.description: type of licenses created from this license template

price.description: price for the license. If >0, it must always be accompanied by the currency specification.

currency.description: specifies currency for the license price. Check data types to discover which currencies are supported.

automatic.description: If set to true, every new licensee automatically gets one license out of this license template on creation. Automatic licenses must have their price set to 0.

hidden.description: If set to true, this license template is not shown in NetLicensing Shop as offered for purchase.

hiddenLicenses.description: If set to true, licenses from this license template are not visible to the end customer, but participate in validation.

number.description: Unique number (across all products of a vendor) that identifies the licensee. Vendor can assign this number when creating a licensee or let NetLicensing generate one. Read-only after creation of the first license for the licensee.

active.description: If set to false, the licensee is disabled. Licensee can not obtain new licenses, and validation is disabled.

number.description: Unique number (across all products/licensees of a vendor) that identifies the license. Vendor can assign this number when creating a license or let NetLicensing generate one. Read-only after corresponding creation transaction status is set to closed.

active.description: If set to false, the license is disabled. License can be re-enabled, but as long as it is disabled, the license is excluded from the validation process.

name.description: Name for the licensed item. Set from license template on creation, if not specified explicitly.

price.description: price for the license. If >0, it must always be accompanied by the currency specification. Read-only, set from license template on creation.

currency.description: specifies currency for the license price. Check data types to discover which currencies are supported. Read-only, set from license template on creation.

hidden.description: If set to true, this license is not shown in NetLicensing Shop as purchased license. Set from license template on creation, if not specified explicitly.

number.description: Unique number (across all products of a vendor) that identifies the transaction. This number is always generated by NetLicensing.

currency.description: specifies currency for the transaction price. Check data types to discover which currencies are supported.
